releaseNotes:
What’s New in the FIFA Official App!

- All-new match center with improved stats, schedules & insights
- Fantasy football & bracket challenge—compete & climb leaderboards
- Follow the FIFA Club World Cup 2025™ with exclusive team updates
- Push notifications are back! Stay connected to scores & breaking news

Update now and stay ahead of the game!
description:
The FIFA Official App: Your Ultimate Football Experience
Welcome to the FIFA Official App, the digital destination for football fans worldwide. Whether you're following your favorite teams, engaging in fantasy football, or keeping up with the latest tournaments, this app puts everything at your fingertips.

Experience the Beautiful Game Like Never Before
Stay up to date with real-time scores, match stats, fixtures, breaking news, and exclusive content from clubs and international competitions, including the all-new FIFA Club World Cup 2025™. Get team updates, tournament schedules, and analysis so you never miss a moment.

Follow Your Team & Stay Connected
Never miss an update on your favorite club! With personalized notifications, receive instant alerts on match results, team news, live scores, and key moments. Whether it's a game-winning goal, a crucial lineup change, or a last-minute transfer, you’ll always be in the loop.

A New Look & Features
We’ve redesigned the app with a modern, intuitive interface and an all-new match center, making it easier than ever to track football action. Get match previews, live stats, post-game analysis, and push notifications tailored to your preferences.

Play, Predict & Win
Test your football knowledge with fantasy football and the exciting bracket challenge, where you can forecast match outcomes, compete with friends, and climb leaderboards.

Stay Informed with FIFA News
Discover the latest football news, tournament updates, exclusive interviews, and behind-the-scenes coverage directly within the app. Follow trending stories and in-depth analysis from the world of FIFA and beyond.

Unlock More with FIFA ID
Sign up for your FIFA ID to access all the contents, rewards, and personalized experiences. Your FIFA ID connects you to official FIFA events, special promotions, and app features tailored just for you.

Join FIFA Rewards
Turn your passion into rewards! Complete challenges and interact with FIFA content to earn digital stamps and XP, unlocking exclusive digital rewards, merchandise, and unique fan experiences.

Follow the FIFA Club World Cup 2025™ & FIFA World Cup 26™
Get exclusive coverage of the FIFA Club World Cup 2025™, featuring teams, stats, schedules, live scores, match highlights, and behind-the-scenes content.

And as the road to the FIFA World Cup 26™ begins, stay tuned for updates, qualifiers, group standings, and everything leading up to football’s biggest event.

Download now and experience the future of football with the FIFA Official App!
